import React, {useState} from 'react' import Button from './Button' export default function Details(props) { const [active, setActive] = useState(false) function handleClick(e) { // console.log(e.target.className.includes('active')); console.log(e.target.name) setActive(!active) return e.target.name; } const color = handleClick() return (

{props.item.price}

{props.item.name}

{props.item.description}

Color : {color? {color}: "Pink"}
01
) }
